PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Hardware support layers

In addition to network-related functionality Microchip Zigbee provides special set of APIs supporting common hardware interfaces.

  • Hardware abstraction layer is responsible for all interactions between the stack and MCU interfaces.
  • Drivers wrap low-level hardware related tasks in certain specific scenarios.
  • Border support package includes a complete set of drivers for managing standard peripherals (such as buttons, sensors etc.) placed on a development board.
